title: Marjorie Taylor Greene calls herself a 'nationalist.' This is what that means
description: The US is being divided by more than political parties as a new movement rises against ethnic diversity and freedom of religion. CNN's Victor Blackwell talks to professor Samuel Perry, who explains the White Christian nationalist movement.

title: Biden administration working behind the scenes to convince Pelosi of the risks of traveling to Taiwan
description: National security officials are quietly working to convince House Speaker Nancy Pelosi of the risks her potential trip to Taiwan could pose during a highly sensitive moment between the self-governing island and China.

title: Debris from massive Chinese booster rocket could fall to Earth early next week
description: The remnants of the massive Chinese rocket that delivered a new module to its space station on Monday are expected to fall to Earth early next week, according to US Space Command, which is tracking the rocket's trajectory.

title: Sharks are millions of years older than dinosaurs and 5 other facts that may surprise you
description: Sharks have scared us a lot this summer, primarily for suspected attacks on humans. However, humans are a larger threat to sharks than sharks are to us.

title: Pence gives speech in Washington just hours before Trump set to return to nation's capital
California's Oak Fire destroys at least 55 structures as it burns more than 17,000 acres near Yosemite National Park
description: California's Oak Fire has burned through more than 17,200 acres and destroyed at least 55 structures since it ignited near California's Yosemite National Park Friday, as fire crews battle overwhelmingly dry conditions and steep terrain, officials say.

title: This animatronic Baby Yoda puppet looks like it's alive
description: EFX Collectibles showed off an animatronic Baby Yoda puppet at San Diego Comic-Con. The toy, produced by Garner Holt Productions, is arguably the most lifelike one to date.

title: Watch bus driver's reaction as deer crashes through the front window
description: A bus driver in the city of Lawton, Oklahoma had quite the surprise when a deer crashed through the front window of the bus.

title: Lufthansa cancels nearly all flights in Germany on Wednesday
description: Lufthansa announced the cancellation of nearly all flights in Germany on Wednesday due to strike action, the company said in a press release Tuesday.

title: Kinzinger encouraged by latest news of Justice Department investigation into January 6
description: Rep. Adam Kinzinger, one of the two Republicans serving on the House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, Capitol riot, said Tuesday he is seeing some positive developments out of the Justice Department's investigation into the riot.

title: See why swarms of jellyfish are surrounding this boat in the Mediterranean
description: In Israel, rising water temperatures are creating the ideal conditions for swarms of jellyfish and costing the tourism industry $10 million in lost revenue. CNN's Hadas Gold reports.

title: Pence gives speech in Washington just hours before Trump set to return to capital
description:
• Analysis: Full scale of Trump's political malfeasance becomes clear as he returns to DC
• Jan. 6 probe is in Trump's White House

title: US officials say 'biggest fear' has come true as Russia cuts gas supplies to Europe
description: The Biden administration is working furiously behind the scenes to keep European allies united against Russia as Moscow further cuts its energy supplies to the European Union, prompting panic on both sides of the Atlantic over potentially severe gas shortages heading into winter, US officials say.

title: At least five dead as anti-United Nations protests rock Democratic Republic of Congo
description: At least five people were killed and about 50 wounded during a second day of violent anti-United Nations protests in Democratic Republic of Congo's eastern city of Goma on Tuesday, a government spokesman said.

title: Here's a look at the 2022 Venice Film Festival lineup
description: In about a month, some of the world's best filmmakers will descend on the "City of Canals" for the 79th Venice International Film Festival.

title: Global food prices are finally falling ... but for how long?
'Black Panther: Wakanda Forever' already gets a soundtrack
description: A  three-track prologue soundtrack has already been released in anticipation of Marvel's upcoming sequel, "Black Panther: Wakanda Forever."

title: See the powerful first trailer for 'Till'
description: Emmett Till's life and and his and his mother's fight for justice are shown in the powerful new trailer for the movie "Till."

title: Democrats' blatant hypocrisy about the 2020 election and its aftermath
description: Democrats have spent months insisting that the aftermath of the 2020 election -- and January 6 in particular -- amounted to a fundamental threat to American democracy and was, therefore, above petty partisan politics.

title: McDonald's customers shrug off higher menu prices as revenue jumps
description: McDonald's has been raising menu prices and customers are eating it up.

title: Europe dials down plans to ration gas
description: The European Union has agreed to ration its natural gas this winter to prevent a severe supply shock. But the bloc has watered down its ambitions by offering countries some significant leeway.

title: Third set of human remains found at Lake Mead amid drought, National Park Service says
description: Another set of human remains was found at Lake Mead Monday as the reservoir's water levels continue to recede, according to a news release from the National Park Service.

title: 'Bunch of bull****': Reporter talks to Trump supporters in wake of hearings
description: CNN's Donie O'Sullivan visits Arizona and speaks with Republican voters at competing Trump and Pence events.

title: These Ukrainians are getting permanent symbols of resistance against Russia
description: Ukraine's resistance to the Russian invasion has been fierce and full of rejuvenated national identity. Every weekend in Kyiv people line up to have national symbols tattooed, with their donations going to the armed forces. CNN spends a day with artists and their customers, learning how each tattoo is loaded with meaning.

title: Russia says it will quit the International Space Station after 2024
description: Russia says it is planning to pull out of the International Space Station and end its decades-long partnership with NASA at the orbiting outpost, according to the newly appointed head of Russia's space agency.

title: Brittney Griner to be cross-examined in trial, lawyers say
description: WNBA star Brittney Griner is in court outside Moscow as her defense team prepares to present evidence in her trial on Tuesday.

title: Nigeria's golden girl Tobi Amusan causes stir after world record win at World Athletics Championships
description: Nigeria's Tobi Amusan has caused a stir after smashing a world record in the women's 100-meter hurdles in the semifinals at the World Championships this Sunday.

title: Nick Cannon welcomes 8th child
description: Nick Cannon is a dad again.

title: Alibaba stock jumps after announcing Hong Kong primary listing
description: Alibaba announced a plan to allow more mainland Chinese investors to invest in the stock.

title: These are the nominees for the 2022 MTV Video Music Awards
description: MTV has revealed its nominations for the 2022 Video Music Awards.

title: Mira Sorvino leads an outpouring of tributes to her late father Paul
description: Tributes have been pouring in to honor the late Paul Sorvino.

title: Iceland's best geothermal bathing pools
description: Spellbinding vistas punctuated by plumes of steam are commonplace while driving Iceland's winding fjords and gravel roads.

title: The inside story of how John Roberts failed to save abortion rights
description: Chief Justice John Roberts privately lobbied fellow conservatives to save the constitutional right to abortion down to the bitter end, but May's unprecedented leak of a draft opinion reversing Roe v. Wade made the effort all but impossible, multiple sources familiar with negotiations told CNN.

title: Red states are building a nation within a nation
description: It was a revealing sign of the times when the Supreme Court last week, in response to a lawsuit from the Republican state attorneys general in Texas and Louisiana, blocked President Joe Biden's administration from changing a key element of federal immigration policy.

title: Australian rugby league club apologizes for 'mismanagement' of pride jersey release after several players refuse to wear it
description: An Australian rugby league club has apologized for its "mismanagement" of the release of its pride jersey after several players said they would boycott playing in it.

title: Somerton man mystery 'solved' as DNA points to man's identity, professor claims
description: A professor who has dedicated decades to solving one of Australia's most enduring mysteries claims he has discovered the identity of the Somerton man.

title: Beijing hits back as UK leadership contenders sharpen China rhetoric
description: Beijing has urged candidates vying to be Britain's next Prime Minister to refrain from "hyping up the so-called 'China threat,'" as foreign relations with the Asian economic giant emerge as a key issue in the closely-fought leadership race.

title: Why diesel is more expensive than regular gas
description: Most drivers today are focused on the high cost of filling up their tanks with regular fuel.

title: 6 facts you might not have learned in sex ed
description: Accurate and comprehensive sex education can be difficult to find in the United States, and people may not always be aware that they aren't receiving sufficient information.

title: This teenager in Kenya is hoping to catch FIFA's attention -- but not for his football skills
description: An 18-year-old Kenyan amateur footballer wants Ronaldo, Messi and Neymar to put down the ball for a moment and pick up a shovel to combat deforestation.

title: Caught on camera: Bridge buckles in scorching heat
description: Video from Chinese social media shows a bridge in the city of Quanzhou in southern China's Fujian province breaking in half due to high temperatures as a heatwave sweeps across China. CNN's Steven Jiang reports.

title: Japanese city thought they had a rogue wild monkey. As attacks rise, now they fear there's more than one
description: Wild monkeys have attacked dozens of residents of a city in southwestern Japan in recent weeks, with reports of the animals crawling through house windows and striking from behind, as police step up an unsuccessful search for them.

title: Why former treasury secretary doesn't think we are in a recession... yet
description: Former Treasury Secretary Larry Summers tells CNN's Don Lemon if he thinks the US is heading into a recession.

title: 'Unbelievable dysfunction': Retired general identifies problem for Russia
description: Retired Army Lt. Gen. Mark Hertling says that Ukraine is ready to open up a second front in the eastern part of the country that could put the Russian army "on the horns of a dilemma".

title: New film flips horror movie tropes on their heads
description: A masked killer stalking teens at a gay conversion therapy camp. What could go wrong? The film "They/Them" is turning the usual Hollywood horror tropes on their heads. See the trailer here.

title: David Trimble, key architect of Good Friday Agreement, dies at 77
description: Tributes are being paid following the death of Nobel Peace Prize winner David Trimble, an architect of the Good Friday agreement that largely ended three decades of conflict in Northern Ireland. He was 77.
